subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Prefix
Usage notes
subSections.text: This is often the first half two-character shorthand name of universities, for example {{m|ja|東大|tr=Tokyo University||Tōdai}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
*{{ja-r|大%主%教|だい%しゅ%きょう|[[archbishop]]}}
*{{ja-r|大%天%使|だい%てん%し|[[archangel]]}}
